column4: I'm trying to get my Mic to work with Pulseaudio and I can't even get it to show activity. I think something alsa related is messing and muting the mic input. Any ideas? Screenshots: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=6092588
have you run alsamixer and checked foe muting and 0-levels etc??
Yeah. The link had some screenshots for the alsamixer levels. I suspect that (somehow) alsamixer is muting things anyway even though it's set not to. Not really sure.
